data.title: This Is The Size Of Warren Buffett's Huge New Amazon Stake
data.text: Warren Buffett revealed a massive new $900 million stake in Amazon, as Berkshire Hathaway filed its latest 13-F Wednesday.

data.title: Amazon Breaks Ground At Kentucky Air Hub
data.text: Amazon.com, Inc. broke ground on May 14 at its $1.5 billion air hub at Cincinnati-Northern Kentucky International Airport.

data.title: Buy Amazon Better Than Buffett Did
data.text: Amazon stock is looking oversold on a technical basis after a sharp sell off. Time to be like Buffett and buy AMZN.

data.title: Instacart and Whole Foods officially part ways, and the CEO says he's ready
data.text: Instacart co-founder and CEO Apoorva Mehta says the company is ready for the split, and he is not looking at the IPO performance of other "unicorns" going public this year.

data.title: What First Quarter Earnings Mean For Amazon Investors
data.text: Amazon's Q1 2019 earnings have been cited as disappointing, but I found them more optimistic than pessimistic.

data.title: Amazon Lockers are driving people to Whole Foods, but they’re staying less than 5 minutes
data.text: When customers say they want to run into Whole Foods to pick up a few things, they might not be talking about groceries.

data.title: Don't Overlook These Metrics From Amazon's First-Quarter Earnings
data.text: Soaring free cash flow, fast-rising subscription services revenue, and more.

data.title: Despite Walmart's new next-day delivery move, some experts still like Amazon more
data.text: Walmart' next-day delivery plan has Wall Street wondering if it can give Amazon a run for its money — but some experts say it's a tough comparison.
